author: The Engineering Mindset
description:
Learn how to extract useful energy from dead batteries,.
Check out PCBWAY➡️ https://www.pcbway.com/ for PCB's, 3D printing and CNC at expectational value and design PCB's with Altium ➡️ http://altium.com/yt/engineeringmindset
In this video, we explain how a simple Joule Thief circuit boosts low voltage using inductors, transistors, and Faraday’s law. Learn how it works, why it works, and how to build one yourself with a DIY kit or custom PCB. Learn how transistors, inductors, toroid transformers, LED and resistors work.
